description:
The Gunpla used by Kamiki Sekai. Its level of completion is very high, and it can be controlled with ease even by Gunpla Battle beginners such as Sekai. The Build Burning Gundam excels in melee combat, where Sekai can make use of his Jigen Haoh school martial arts techniques.
Source: Official Website
name: BG-011B Build Burning Gundam
